programs.name: BIA Tribal Climate Resilience
programs.advocacy_lever: Protect/expand the line; waived match, multi-year stability
programs.description: Core BIA program funding Tribal climate adaptation planning and implementation.
programs.ci_determination: FY26 funded at $34.291M. Core vehicle; focus on permanent multi-year stability.
programs.tightened_language: Protect the $34.291M base funding line as a floor, ensuring non-competitive, direct-access pathways for Tribes to bypass administrative bottlenecks inherent in discretionary grant cycles.

programs.name: FEMA BRIC
programs.description: FEMA pre-disaster mitigation competitive grant program.
programs.ci_determination: FEMA announced termination of BRIC on April 4, 2025. FY24/25 cycles canceled. ~$882M unobligated IIJA funds being returned to Treasury. Requires immediate specialist engagement.
programs.specialist_focus: Advocacy must pivot to the replacement mechanism. Ensure Tribal set-asides are baked into the new 'responsive mitigation approach' from day one. Protect existing fully obligated projects.

programs.name: IRS Elective Pay
programs.advocacy_lever: Ensure stability and Tribal instrumentality access
programs.description: IRA provision allowing Tribes to receive clean energy tax credits as direct payments.
programs.ci_determination: Final regulations (Jan 2026) confirm Tribal instrumentalities as applicable entities.
programs.tightened_language: Maintain the January 2026 final rule status of Tribal instrumentalities (Section 17/Section 3 corps) to ensure liquidity for Tribal energy projects without the need for tax-equity partners.

programs.name: EPA STAG
programs.description: EPA State and Tribal Assistance Grants for environmental infrastructure.
programs.ci_determination: IIJA-funded supplemental lines (Lead/PFAS) remain active through FY26.

programs.name: EPA GAP
programs.advocacy_lever: Increase funding; link to climate resilience readiness
programs.description: EPA General Assistance Program providing base environmental capacity to Tribes.

programs.name: FEMA Tribal Mitigation Plans
programs.description: FEMA support for Tribal hazard mitigation planning.
programs.ci_determination: Loss of BRIC as primary funding incentive reduces plan ROI; statutory requirement remains but funding for planning is opaque.
programs.proposed_fix: Legislative mandate for automatic plan updates post-disaster.

programs.name: DOT PROTECT
programs.description: DOT program for resilience improvements to surface transportation.
programs.ci_determination: Tribal set-aside (2%) is statutorily protected through FY26.

programs.name: USDA Wildfire Defense Grants
programs.advocacy_lever: Add match waivers; long-term fuels pathways
programs.description: USDA grants for community wildfire defense and fuels management.
programs.ci_determination: High Tribal participation but subject to Forest Management reforms (EO 14225).
programs.proposed_fix: Codify Tribal match waivers in FY26 Interior Approps.

programs.name: DOE Indian Energy
programs.description: DOE Office of Indian Energy programs for Tribal energy development.

programs.name: HUD IHBG
programs.federal_home: Department of Housing and Urban Development
programs.advocacy_lever: Frame resilient housing as trust responsibility
programs.description: HUD Indian Housing Block Grant program under NAHASDA.

programs.name: NOAA Tribal Grants
programs.description: NOAA programs supporting Tribal climate and coastal resilience.

programs.name: FHWA TTP Safety
programs.description: FHWA Tribal Transportation Program safety funding.

programs.name: USBR WaterSMART
programs.advocacy_lever: Expand Tribal drought access; lower match
programs.description: Bureau of Reclamation WaterSMART grants for water conservation and drought resilience.

programs.name: USBR TAP
programs.description: Bureau of Reclamation Technical Assistance Program.
